name: Soltato FRIES
description: FRIES is the utility and reward token for Soltato NFT, a generative and animated NFT on Solana. Holders of Soltato NFT will receive weekly airdrop of FRIES. By holding FRIES, owners could be rewarded with the Soltato NFT fee buyback by staking in liquidity pool of FRIES. Additionally, FRIES holders has the governance right over the future path of the Soltato Project, with the potential utility of upgrading NFT with the token.
